plot: A down and out talent agent discovers a dance prodigy, and together they journey towards rebuilding their broken lives and realizing their dreams.
title: KeJive
plot_es: A down and out talent agent discovers a dance prodigy, and together they journey towards rebuilding their broken lives and realizing their dreams.
plot_en: A down and out talent agent discovers a dance prodigy, and together they journey towards rebuilding their broken lives and realizing their dreams.
